sentences.sentence: He was fulsome in his praise of the Prime Minister.
sentences.translation: 他称赞首相时有溢美之词。

sentences.sentence: Newspapers have been fulsome in their praise of the former president.
sentences.translation: 报界对前任总统的赞扬过于恭维了。

sentences.sentence: I was disgusted by her fulsome flattery.
sentences.translation: 我讨厌她那套令人作呕的奉承。
